Reviews.Title: “Great service, great location.”
Reviews.Author: David P
Reviews.Content: stayed friends visit napa valley receptionist extremely helpful hotel renovated bathrooms renovated nice happened stay renovated spoke receptionist concerns apologized completely partial refund unexpected recommend affordable stay location

Reviews.Title: “It's fine if you know what to expect”
Reviews.Author: Sculthorpe-Pike
Reviews.Content: wasnt hotel stayed ca trip firstly location dining excellent restaurants minutes walk opposite hotel day wine tasting dont car ladies own run pleasant helpful signs grubby carpets etc complained admittedly expensive paid usd 120 shared bathrooms available bathrooms clean dry sign using breakfast motel style usa hotel calm quiet air howver fairly noisy aircon fan outside window night otherwise real complaints enjoy hotel choose st helena enjoy region visit wineries etc ideal

Reviews.Title: “i'd stay elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: glenn d
Reviews.Content: sparse accomodations price mistake 3 nights reservation 2 nights touring valley business partner received call 3 pm indicating failed checkout gathered plastic bag counter unprofessional stay else third night

Reviews.Title: “disappointing”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel st helena looking website clue refunds sign reception desk hotel reasonably clean carpeting decor personal choice collections dolls knick knacks spartan stuffy bags floor nightstand beds wobbly armoire offered couple wire clothes hangers hooks coats hooks bathroom beds soft sat middle mattress pads sheet bed realized heads low feet pillows cant report continental breakfast highpoint late cindys backstreet cafe excellent

Reviews.Title: “Get Me Out of Here.”
Reviews.Author: drisSeattle
Reviews.Content: cant imagine rating zero bad maroon carpets badly stained bathroom barely street noise loud cant windows louder inside outside television joke 1970s fuzzy terrible reception read prop little chair feet bed cozy bedspread smelled terribly mans cologne threw pillows floor own travel pillow pillows looked ones throw son home weeks summer camp gross breakfast sad affair dont believe reviews french breakfast whatever reconstituted orange juice piece flimsy raisin toast vat recycled cream cheese wine reception careful glasses mine crack speaks entire oh re haunted nature reviews doubt creepy aura bad happened except guy walking gone 5 minutes creepy theres set foot wallet overpriced dump

Reviews.Title: “Creepiest hotel "stay" ever!”
Reviews.Author: threadbearer61
Reviews.Content: recently tried stay hotel st helena enroute 3 pm received phone call coming yes 5pm key mat 515 thats found upstairs nicely appointed oldfashioned hotelat monks cell cold closet sewing workshop nice garments hanging mini tv 34 wall hospital dresser garments weird weirder walk grabbing bite eat coming eight soul hotel dark cold slamming noise sounded door voices footsteps following slam figured central heating system cold frankly creeped wine promised check till 6 pm left answering service thats called leaving hadnt toilet hall charged call day 3 telling charged night drove calistoga stayed expensive hotel 72 hour cancellation policy received confirmation letter saying promises wine checkin times etc couldnt stay dont relevant policy anyway read hotel haunted glad choice leave hotel business

Reviews.Title: “The best little hotel we have ever stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: BucknElle
Reviews.Content: unexpectedly found gem suprised beyond imagination charming highlight location service quaintness breakfast atmosphere couldnt believe price location slept windows hear traffic peaceful walk shops incredible restaurants dozens wineries 10 minutes stay recommend considering trip napa

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular Hotel at an affordable price”
Reviews.Author: hotelstayer48
Reviews.Content: hotel truly amazing stay enjoyed beautiful free breakfast wine close proximity fabulous stores restaurants spotless staff helpful priced hotel ive stayed al time fabulous getaway

Reviews.Title: “Really badddddddddddddd”
Reviews.Author: las_vegas_hottie
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean pillows comfort set god smell bad sleep pillow night totally overpriced life stay dont stay st helena hotel

Reviews.Title: “Funky but charming”
Reviews.Author: Offandrunning
Reviews.Content: husband daughter boyfriend separate stayed hotel night following wedding friend location smack dab main street st helena meant easy middle wine country action hotel staff nice hotel funky charming european scale definitely bathrooms clean towels fluffy threadbare hotels expensive twonight minimum middle summer plus complementary wine bar evening continental breakfast am perfect overnight stay change wedding lay heads night dont enjoyed half planned center weekend luxurious hotel stay
